update t_contract_log
contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
log_name = #{logName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_contract_log set contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, log_name = #{logName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, log_content = #{logContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment_classify_id = #{attachmentClassifyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, attachment_classify_name = #{attachmentClassifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, operator_name = #{operatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_dept_ids = #{operatorDeptIds,jdbcType=BIGINT}, operator_dept_names = #{operatorDeptNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select: select from t_contract_log where contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by create_time desc
